SEARCH
Package com.meteordevelopments.duels.api.user

Interface User

public interface User
Represents a User loaded on the server.

      void setLosses(int losses)
      Sets new total wins for this user.
      Parameters:
      losses - New total losses.

    • canRequest

      boolean canRequest()
      Whether or not this user is receiving duel requests.
      Returns:
      True if this user has requests enabled. False otherwise.

    • setRequests

      void setRequests(boolean requests)
      Enables or disables duel requests for this user.
      Parameters:
      requests - True to allow sending duel requests to this user. False otherwise.

    • getMatches

      @NotNull List<MatchInfo> getMatches()
      UnmodifiableList of recent matches for this user.
      Returns:
      Never-null UnmodifiableList of recent matches for this user.

    • getRating

      int getRating()
      Gets the no kit rating. thread-safe!
      Returns:
      no kit rating.
      Since:
      3.3.0

    • getRating

      int getRating(@NotNull Kit kit)
      Gets the rating of the given Kit. thread-safe!
      Parameters:
      kit - Kit to check for rating.
      Returns:
      Rating for this Kit.

    • resetRating

      void resetRating()
      Resets the rating to default for the no kit rating. thread-safe!
      Since:
      3.3.0

    • resetRating

      void resetRating(@NotNull Kit kit)
      Resets the rating to default for the given Kit. thread-safe!
      Parameters:
      kit - Kit to reset the rating to default.

    • reset

      void reset()
      Resets user's wins, losses, recent matches, and all rating.
